question: Bala Devi, who was seen in news recently, is associated with which sports?
explanation:
The 29-year old sportsperson from Manipur, Bala Devi was seen in news recently as she became the first Indian woman footballer to sign up with a professional football club abroad. The prestigious European club, Rangers Women FC signed the Indian footballer from Manipur for 18 months.
Bala Devi has also been the captain of the national women\'s team and the top scorer for the team with 52 goals in 58 games. She also holds the top international goal-scorer rank in the South Asian region. The footballer has also been named AIFF\'s Woman Player of the Year in 2015 and 2016.
